Banner.Description:
I'm a Full Stack Developer with over 3 years of experience in
.NET, Angular, Node.js, Java, Azure, AWS, Blockchain, and DevOps.

Led development of several projects estimating their worth over $8 million.

I'm a highly motivated software engineer who has developed, designed, and maintained several high quality software.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: With over 3 years of experience in full-stack development, I've contributed to numerous projects, collectively valued at over 8 million dollars.
Y. Hata Customer Portal, endorsed by Microsoft, was spotlighted in an article detailing our success story, and I also collaborated on a Live Commerce venture supported by the Microsoft team.

I have experience working on both the development and infrastructure sides of applications. I prioritize writing code that is easy to maintain and understand. I have a strong grip on software engineering principles.
Some of the technologies that I have worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Consultant Development
Description: Worked on a customer portal for a food service distributor in Hawaii and achieved a remarkable 5x performance boost compared to their old ERP System
Ideated and Created a Live Streaming Platform for sellers where they can host live streaming shows to sell directly to a global audience
Enhanced the content delivery by Compressing, Encoding, and transcoding videos in different formats to serve content more efficiently using Azure Media Services
Reduced the infrastructure cost by more than 80% by devising a serverless architecture using Azure Functions
Implemented Single sign-on and integrated Azure AD using MSAL
Integrated Microsoft Dynamics D365 using OData Protocol in the portal and created CronJobs for syncing data periodically
Developed frontend components using Angular 17 and used modular design and smart&dumb components pattern techniques
Created REST APIs using .NET 6 and Spring Boot 3
Deployed application seamlessly through Azure CI/CD pipeline
Enhanced the data synchronization architecture, achieving a 10x efficiency using parallel processing with Azure Queue Service and Entity Framework Bulk methods

Experience.Jobs.Title: DevOps Intern
Description: Worked for platform team, contributing towards the development of Pakistan's first private cloud
Created a CI/CD Pipeline for QA Environment using Jenkins and Groovy Script
Built an Infrastructure as Code using Terraform
Created deployment and service files for Keycloak and deployed it on Kubernetes cluster

Experience.Jobs.Title: Blockchain Engineer
Description: Created Flash Token Smart Contract using Solidity 0.7.4 and Openzeppelin on Ethereum Chain
Created Subgraphs using The Graph Protocol for querying on the Ethereum Chain
Built a tweets scrapper using Python 3, that scraped tweets of XIO token holders who participated in the Flash staking competition
Created an XIO Token Distribution Bot using Node.js, Web3.js
Researched on gas fees optimizations and proposed a Layer 2 solution on Matic Network.

FeatureProjects.Title: Personal Projects

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Blocktrade
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Blocktrade is a supply chain management system that optimizes the supply chain processes. The transactions are recorded on a private blockchain i.e. Hyperledger Fabric and the state is maintained using CouchDB. smart contracts are made using Golang

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, ideas, or opportunities to discuss, I'm here to help. Reach out today, and I'll respond as soon as possible. Let's connect and create something amazing together!
